conclusion: The magnetic induction intensity of the uniform magnetic field is B=0.1T, the number of turns of the rectangular coil is n=100, the side lengths are l_AB=0.2m and l_BC=0.5m, and it rotates uniformly around the symmetry axis OO' with an angular velocity ω=100π rad/s. Timing starts when the coil plane passes through the neutral plane.
The angular frequency ω is related to the frequency f by the formula ω = 2πf.
The frequency f is calculated as f = ω / 2π = 100π / 2π = 50 Hz.
The number of revolutions per second (rps) is n = ω / 2π = 100π / 2π = 50.
The number of cycles per second (Hz) is N = 1 / f = 1 / 50 = 0.02 Hz.
The induced EMF E is given by the formula E = N × (B × l_AB × l_BC) / 2π.
Substituting the given values into the formula: E = 0.02 × (0.1 × 0.2 × 0.5) / 2π.
